price: We distribute it among them so that they may take heed[27], but most people persist in their ingratitude.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَٰهُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا
footnotes: [27] Such as Allah’s ability to bring the dead to life.
